---
title: "Development Project Index"
format: 
  html:
    toc: true
    toc-location: left
---
  
  This index tracks all development projects, historic properties, and other sites reviewed by Madison's Plan Commission, Urban Design Commission, and Landmarks Commission during 2025.

## How to Use This Index

- **Address**: Property location
- **Legistar**: City tracking number (click to view official record)
- **Commissions**: Which body reviewed the project (PC = Plan Commission, UDC = Urban Design Commission, LM = Landmarks)
- **Meeting Links**: Click dates to jump to relevant meeting summaries

## Development Project Index
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Create the comprehensive index
project_index <- tribble(

# Format the table
project_index %>%
  arrange(desc(Date), Address) %>%
  kable("html", escape = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"),
                font_size = 11) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "18%", bold = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "8%") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "8%") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10%") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "12%") %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "44%")
